sentence: With all the negatives out of the way this was really a very slick and efficient hotel and a most pleasant experience
Superior Customer experience from front of house reception room comfort including a lovely bathroom with bath and separate shower
Music and atmosphere aimed at 15 years old or anyone headign for a rave
Very pleasant and attentive but unobtrusive staff creating a great atmosphere made to feel very welcome
This was my first time at any Kempinski hotel and it was a nice experience
Front desk staff were very helpful in orienting us to our surroundings
Good hotel but seventh experience not as good
I will never stay in another Kempinski after this experience

Simply the most perfect location and an extremely clever series of spaces forming what is almost a street scene that runs from the entrance to the luxury shopping of the rear street and the grandeur of the main entrance lobby
We stayed in room 701 a junior suite which has a corner aspect and it was stunning
I would like to note that my wife and I have stayed at the hotel as a great experience
Very disappointing experience and would not recommend it
Around the hotel there is a Christmas Happening atmosphere with food markets
Maybe this tom is good for early birds but for us it was not a very good experience at such a hotel
Rooms are good but we did experience renovation noise during the first afternoon
All staff were very rude restaurants front office concierge deskFrankly I wish I never have stayed in this hotel although my experience with other kempinski hotels was very nice
We have stayed here for a total of 15 nights the last two years and not one bad experience except for the hotels taxi driver to almost fall asleep on the way to the AirPort
Things can happen mistakes happen problems happen but we never received any jester of apology or feeling from any of the staff or managers that they care and want to make our experience any better
Restaurant atmosphere and service not what I would expect at a Kempinski hotel
The architecture of the glass clad Corvinus is structured to assume the shape of the letter C
I would expect to find better experience to justify the price deference
